title: Stage S25
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I've been to Paris three times.
I have tried sushi, and it was delicious.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: I've been to Paris three times.
I have tried sushi, and it was delicious.
I've never seen snow in real life.
Have you ever been to a concert?

sentences.kr: 패러글라이딩을 해본 적이 있어요. 정말 대단했어요!
sentences.en: I have done paragliding before. It was amazing!

sentences.kr: 그녀는 다섯 개의 다른 나라에서 살아봤어요.
sentences.en: She has lived in five different countries.
We have worked together for many years.
I have learned so much from this experience.
Have you had a chance to visit the new museum?

sentences.kr: 이 일을 통해 많은 흥미로운 사람들을 만났어요.
sentences.en: I have met many interesting people through this job.
